title: Pune Porsche crash: Bombay High Court orders release of accused juvenile
selftext: Welcome to India, where you can buy the judicial system with money. My heart goes out to the families of the victims. They didn’t get justice. I don’t think they will even fight for justice because they aren’t as powerful (moneywise and connection-wise) as Vedant’s family.
